        Description copied from class: Piece
        Gives the score of a piece at where it is, given the bounds of the board and radius of corner holes.
        Specified by:
        score in class Piece
        Parameters:
        minX - left boundary
        minY - top boundary
        maxX - right boundary
        maxY - top boundary
        radius - radius of the hole in the corner
        Returns:
        The score that the piece should net at its current XY location in those bounds
